Name: must_match_user_story_status_ready
Description: User stories must have status = 'Ready' before selection

Name: must_match_feature_status_refined
Description: Features must have status = 'Refined' prior to sprint planning

Name: cannot_match_blocker_severity_critical
Description: Exclude blockers with severity = 'Critical' from planned scope

Name: must_match_sprint_goal_achievement_status_aligned
Description: Sprint goal achievement_status must be 'Aligned' with Product Goal

Name: may_match_sprint_review_attendees_sufficient
Description: Prefer sprint reviews with attendees_count >= quorum
